description:
This package contains all available language files for TrueCrypt, the free open-source disk encryption software. The language files get extracted into the TrueCrypt program folder. Then the desired language can be selected in the TrueCrypt settings.
Note: The language files are public domain, so they can be distributed and modified freely.
summary: Language files for TrueCrypt, the free open-source disk encryption software
author: Various (see http://www.truecrypt.org/localizations)
